location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from D Heathcote, Commander of HMS Lionto Sir Arthur Gore Ouseley, Baronet

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying a request to procure the services of the HC Dispatch Boat [ Barbara Pattamai]. It explains that this request is made due to the supplies of fresh meat at Bushire being of poor quality and expensive, while Bussora [Basra] on the other hand is believed to have abundant supplies of such produce.
